author: Simon Difford
description: A Whiskey Sour made Daisy-like with a hint of almond.
name: Whiskey Daisy No.3
recipeIngredient: 25 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients and strain into chilled glass
